description:
Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Team names and logos in this app are used solely for identification purposes. Neither the EPL nor any EPL club endorses or is associated with this application. 

By using this app, you agree to Apple’s standard End User License Agreement (EULA):

Darts Scorer App Score Counter 2025 is designed for darts lovers.
With this app you can easily count scores while playing X01 and Cricket darts games with your friends. App calculates all points, statistics and automatically determines the winner. In the application you can choose players, the number of Legs and Sets, the game mode and the number of scores 301, 501. It is also possible to save games and play them later. You don't need to buy a special Scoreboard or scorekeeper, everything is available in your phone. Download and track game results with this easy-to-use and free darts calculator.

Cricket Australia Live is your No.1 destination for live cricket scores, match coverage, breaking news, video highlights and in-depth feature stories.

Features:
• Live cricket scores, stats, ladders, fixtures and more
• Live streaming of Australia Men’s and Women’s international matches played in Australia *
• Live streaming of the KFC BBL and Weber WBBL*
• BBL and WBBL ladders and fixtures
• Free live streaming of all Australian domestic cricket matches**
• Free radio streaming for international and Big Bash matches played in Australia
• Video highlights of all the action including wicket replays in our match centre ***
• Breaking cricket news from Australia and around the world
• Exclusive behind-the-scenes content from on the road with the Australian Cricket Teams
• Inside access to the game’s biggest stars
• Chromecast and AirPlay available on all videos
• Enhanced Matchday experience to help you get the most out of your day at the cricket
 
We recommend streaming over a wi-fi network when possible as additional data charges may apply from your mobile or internet provider.
 
* Kayo account required to access streaming service, provided by Foxtel.
** Marsh Sheffield Shield, WNCL, Marsh One-Day Cup
*** Only available for matches played in Australia
 
For support please contact: https://support.cricket.com.au/

Cricket Australia Privacy Policy: https://www.cricket.com.au/privacy

description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.


Terms of Use: https://livesport.eu/terms-of-use/en-gb
Privacy Policy: https://livesport.eu/privacy-policy/en-gb

Tribe is your Destination for Sport. We wanted to design something that represented sport how PEOPLE think, not organisations. This is our attempt at that. We still consider things to be in its infancy, and we're constantly looking to add new content, features, and ways to make following sport better.

Ultimately we'll cover everything, but here are some of the key things we cover right now:

RUBGY:
+ International Rugby
+ Men's Rugby World Cup, Women's Rugby World Cup, Men's U20 World Cup
+ The Rugby Championship, Tri Nations, Bledisloe Cup, Six Nations, Lions Tours
+ Super Rugby, Super Rugby Pacific, Super Rugby Aupiki
+ Bunnings NPC / Mitre 10 Cup, Farah Palmer Cup, Currie Cup
+ Premiership Rugby, United Rugby Championship, Top 14, Pro D2
+ Major League Rugby (MLR)
+ Japan Rugby League One
+ SVNS / HSBC Sevens World Series (Men's & Women's)
+ Sevens World Cup (Men & Women)
+ Olympic 7s (Men & Women)
+ NZ Club Rugby
+ NZ 1st XV High School Rugby

RUGBY LEAGUE:
+ International League
+ Rugby League World Cup (RLWC)
+ Super League, RFL Championship, RFL League 1, Challenge Cup
+ NRL, NRLW
+ State of Origin

FOOTBALL (SOCCER):
+ FIFA World Cup, World Cup Qualifying
+ UEFA European Championships (Euros)
+ Copa America, Asian Cup, African Cup of Nations
+ UEFA Nations League, CONCACAF Nations League
+ U20 World Cup, U17 World Cup, Women's World Cup
+ English Premier League, English Championship, FA Cup, Carabao Cup
+ La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1
+ UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League
+ Australian A-League, FFA Cup
+ MLS, US Open Cup, Mexican Liga MX
+ Olympic Football (Men & Women)
+ NZ National League, Chatham Cup, Kate Sheppard Cup
+ NZ Club Football

CRICKET:
+ Cricket World Cup (Men & Women)
+ T20 World Cup (Men & Women)
+ World Test Championship
+ International Cricket (Tests, ODIs, T20s, The Ashes)
+ Australian Big Bash (BBL), Women's Big Bash (WBBL)
+ New Zealand Super Smash, Ford Trophy
+ Indian Premier League (IPL)
+ Caribbean Premier League (CPL)
+ Pakistan Super League (PSL)
+ Major League Cricket (MLC)

BASKETBALL:
+ NBA
+ Australian NBL
+ New Zealand NBL
+ Tauihi Basketball Aotearoa

NETBALL:
+ Netball World Cup
+ International Netball (Netball Nations Cup, Quad Series, Constellation Cup, Nations Cup, Taini Jamison Trophy)
+ Suncorp Super Netball
+ ANZ Premiership, Super Club Netball
+ Netball Superleague

(AMERICAN) FOOTBALL:
+ NFL

(AUSSIE RULES) FOOTBALL:
+ AFL
+ AFL Women's
+ AFL NZ Premiership

FIELD HOCKEY:
+ Men's International Hockey (Men's FIH PRO League)
+ Women's International Hockey (Women's FIH Pro League)
+ Olympic Hockey (Men & Women)

And so much more...

We provide full play-by-play text commentary for a lot of different sports, leagues and competitions... and live scoring for a whole lot more.

If we don't yet cover your favourite sport, team, league, event or sportsperson, we likely will soon.

If your favourite is missing, do let us know. You can do so directly within the app or via support@tribesportsapp.com.

We hope you enjoy using Tribe as much as we've enjoyed making it for you.

Payments, Subscriptions, and Refunds

Tribe has ad-free subscriptions. While we make every effort to ensure the continued operation of Tribe, we cannot make any guarantee regarding future access to the App.

Payment will be charged via the iTunes App Store upon confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Accounts will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the original cost. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings on their phones after purchase.

For more information see or ToS: http://cdn.tribesportsapp.com/static/Tribe_Terms_and_Conditions.pdf

For more information on Privacy: http://cdn.tribesportsapp.com/static/TribePrivacyPolicySupportInfo.pdf

Cricbuzz - Experience cricket like never before with World’s no.1 Cricket app. Get extensive coverage of all International cricket, ICC World Cup, IPL, BBL, CPL, PSL, T20 Blast, domestic cricket and hundreds of cricket tournaments across the world.

* Fast Scores & Commentary: Stay updated with super-fast scores and immersive ball-by-ball commentary.

* Exclusive Premium Content: Get access to premium editorials and original video content with a subscription
* Upcoming Match Schedules: Plan your viewing effortlessly with upcoming match schedules.
* Rankings, Stats & Records: Explore cricket's intricacies with comprehensive data at your fingertips.
* Special content for major tournaments like ICC Cricket World Cup, T20 World Cup, IPL, Champions Trophy, WPL etc.,

Whether you are a seasoned follower of the game or a new fan Cricbuzz app has you covered.

Terms of Use - https://www.cricbuzz.com/info/termsofuse
Privacy Policy - https://www.cricbuzz.com/info/privacy

AiScore is your Live score expert, bringing to you more information, more statistics and a completely new experience on your smartphone. Here you are even informed faster than the TV viewers!

With In-depth coverage of football, basketball, tennis and snooker, AiScore brings you live score,goals, yellow or red cards, H2H, fixtures, match live, team and player stats, standings, lineups and other important stats from English Premier League, Spanish La Liga, UEFA Champions League, NBA, FIBA, Basketball Champions League, ATP tennis, WTA tennis, World Snooker Championship - major or small leagues and competitions all over the world!

TOP HIGHLIGHTS:

*All Games - Follow all today's matches in real time. Also, you can check out the matches on specific day by DateTime Picker.

*Live - Stay up to date with all the latest scores and results from hundreds and thousands of games worldwide. Every score at a glance. Just tap the matchup for Box Score or Lineups, H2H and Match Live.

*Favorites - Choose your favorite team and competition on matchup and always be up-to-date.

*Instant Notification - Get instant notifications of goal, corner, red or yellow card, start, starting lineups and final results for all live or your followed matches. A pop-up window will appear to inform you of score changing when you turn on the "Score Reminder”.

*Leagues - In-depth coverage of leagues, cups and tournaments from over 200 countries. Check out latest rankings, standings, team or player stats and more.

Football: Over 2,600 different football matches, over 37,000 teams (including Premier League, Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Championship and many more)

Basketball: Over 500 tournaments including FIBA Basketball World Cup, NBA, BCL

Tennis: Complete source for worldwide tennis matches including ATP, WTA

Snooker: Complete source for worldwide snooker matches including World Championship, UK Championship, Masters

*Chatroom - Get connected with other sports fans from all over the world. No game is boring if you can chat live.

*Language - 28 (more will be added)

Welcome to RaceNet.


Please note that this app is part of our intranet for Partners, Sponsors and Suppliers and requires a login and password issued by your client services manager. 

The RaceNet app is our intranet and the central information hub for race partners, sponsors and suppliers.
Use RaceNet to find out everything you need to know about the shore side of the event including logistics, key dates and events, and keep up with all of the latest updates. 

You’ll also be able to exchange information, find essential documentation and Q&As and use our Who’s Who database to find contacts across the race organisation, teams and stakeholders.

Why players choose it

Instant darts scorekeeper: tap to subtract, auto-checkouts shown.

Clear scoreboard: live totals, last throws, and remaining points.

Doubles & teams for pub nights or darts club play.

Leg/Set match formats with averages and checkout %.

Features

Share results with your darts club or friends

Perfect for

FrogBox Play brings cricket highlights to your fingertips with an infinite feed of short clips, showcasing everything from big hits to standout catches.

Swipe through moments from local games in your community and beyond, with fresh highlights updated regularly so you’re always up-to-date on the action.

Personalise your experience by searching and saving favourite clip collections, building playlists of top plays and memorable moments from friends, family and local teams. Share clips with friends and family effortlessly.

Dart Scores is the ultimate tool while playing darts for everyone from beginning enthusiasts to experienced professionals.

Dart Scores offers an impressive set of features in several areas: Player management, Darts scoreboard, Tournament planning and Training.

PLAYER MANAGEMENT
- Add players and/or remove any amount of players, completely free of charge
- Keep track of useful information like games player, games won, turns played and average score

DARTS SCOREBOARD
- Set up games with different sets, game types and players of your choice
- Supported game types: 101, 203, 301, 501, 701, Tactics and Cricket
- For quick play, the app always has a preset game ready to start with one tap
- Keep track of all scores in a game in a smooth and ergonomically designed scoreboard
- The app automatically switches turns and calculates who gets the first throw
- Manually switch turns by simply tapping on a players name
- Watch live statistics during the game through the 'Stats' button
- The app provides guidance for the best finish as soon as one is available

TOURNAMENT PLANNING
- The app can automatically organize tournaments with 4 and 8 participants
- By default, the 101, 201, 301, 501 and 701 game types are supported for tournaments

TRAINING
- Train your accuracy by aiming for several dart segments while the app measures the amount of time it takes you to hit the randomly selected segment. Available in easy and hard
- The app can provide you a random score from 1 to 180 and measures the amount of time it takes you to throw that score with maximum 3 darts
- Timed around the clock
- The app can unlimitedly repeat all segments on the dart board to keep you aiming for randomly selected segments for as long as you want, without interruption from the app.
- Training with multiple players

AVAILABLE UPGRADES
Dart Scores provides you with an impressive set of features completely free of charge, but also offers you the possibility to upgrade your darts experience through several upgrades

REMOVE ADS
- The app does not contain an annoying amount of ads to start with, but for those who want a complete ad-free experience, this upgrade can buy the ads out forever.

GAME UPGRADE
- Adds support for the 1001 Game Type
- Adds 1001 and Cricket support for tournaments
- Allows for up to 6 participants in a single game
- Allows players to play a 301, 501, 701 or 1001 game alone against BullBot
- Adds per dart scoring (on iPhone 5 and newer)
- Adds First To modus

DATA UPGRADE
- Allows you to view all stand-alone games played with custom players, and their scoreboards
- View charts of your statistics
- Pause x01 games
- Detailed insight in training statistics
- Data available as from version 4.4

﻿Welcome to our unique darts scorekeeping app! Our special feature is a virtual dartboard where you can enter your score by tapping directly on the dart fields. It's like having a real dartboard in the palm of your hand!

But that's just the beginning. With game modes including X01 (301/501), Cricket, and 8 party games, as well as local and online play modes, you'll have endless opportunities to compete and improve your skills. Plus, our app includes bots that allow you to practice against five different skill levels, making it the perfect tool for players of all experience levels.

MAIN FEATURES:
▪ 	Game modes: X01 (301/501), Cricket, and 8 party games
▪	Local mode: Supports unlimited amount of players
▪	Online mode: Play remotely with your friends and relatives
▪	Bots: Practice by playing against five differently skilled bots
▪	4 score input methods including a virtual dartboard
▪	Smart checkout helper for beginners or pros
▪	Voice recognition and speech output
▪	Player management with profile pictures
▪	Optimized X01 score view for connected screen via AirPlay
▪	Extensive statistics

ALL GAME MODES:
▪ 	X01 (301/501/701)
▪ 	Cricket
▪ 	Highscore
▪ 	Elimination
▪ 	Killer
▪ 	Shanghai
▪ 	Shooter
▪ 	Splitscore
▪ 	1 To 20
▪ 	Round the Clock

PRICING:
▪ 	First 7 days without ads
▪ 	Recommended: One time purchase for lifetime full access without ads
▪ 	Alternative: Free full access with ads

Welcome to the brand new Official Canberra Raiders app. Our completely redesigned experience gives you access to your favourite team and favourite players - plus you'll get breaking Canberra Raiders news, live scores, stats, game day information and match highlights. It's everything you need to know about the Canberra Raiders, no matter where you are.
 
With its updated interface and improved navigation, the Official Canberra Raiders app is packed with features and content, including:
 
•	Full team lists
•	Extensive pre, live and post-match coverage
•	Video, including match and player highlights.
 
The Official Canberra Raiders app will keep you in the front row. Download now and never miss a minute of the greatest game of all!

Lvxo — Your Jump & Explosion Training Social Platform
Lvxo, the top space for athletes focusing on leap and burst, is here. Pondering whether to join a plyometric team challenge or swap explosive movement tips, or unsure how to show off your jump progress? The platform has your back. The Training Buddy Connector pairs you with peers chasing similar goals, the Drill Share Hub features community-favorite explosive exercises, and the Progress Tracker lets you post and celebrate your leap gains. Chat to exchange training routines, overcome plateaus, and boost jump power together.
Whether you’re a seasoned athlete or a fitness newbie, Lvxo turns jump and explosion training into an engaging, communal journey.

Huba Football is your all-in-one destination for immersive and real-time football live scores. Whether you're tracking live matches, analyzing team stats or individual player performance, Huba Football brings you closer to the game with clarity and depth.

App Key Features:

* Live Scores & Match Center:
Follow every match as it happens with real-time scores, game status updates, and live commentary. Home, away, and neutral venues are clearly displayed with intuitive UI.

* Detailed Match Statistics:
Access comprehensive team stats including shots on/off goal, blocked shots, fouls, corner kicks, and pass accuracy — all visualized in a clean and readable format.

* Fixtures & Results:
Stay up to date with ongoing, upcoming, and past fixtures. Navigate through daily match schedules and browse through historical results.

* Lineups & Formations:
View team formations with visual representation. Analyze how each team sets up with formations like 4-2-3-1, including detailed player positions.

* Goal & Event Timelines:
Track every key match moment: goals (normal and penalties), player substitutions, yellow/red cards, and more — all timestamped and structured.

* Player Profiles & Stats:
Explore in-depth player statistics such as goals, assists, passes completed, dribbles attempted/successful, and more. Access player transfer history and trophy achievements per season.

* Instant Push Notifications:
Get notified in real-time for match starts, goals, cards, and final results — never miss a moment that matters.

* Team Overview & Stadium Info:
Discover team insights including home ground details, stadium capacity, playing surface, and recent form with last 6 game results.

* Latest Football News:
Browse football headlines tailored for you. View articles with images and story highlights from the football world, all updated daily.

* Search & Discover Leagues:
Easily search for global competitions with season filters. Quickly access league details and navigate through team performances.

* Cards Stats:
Monitor discipline across competitions — view players with red card stats in structured and ranked format.

* Transfer History & Trophies:
Follow a player’s career journey with transfer movements and club changes. Also explore their earned trophies and seasonal accolades.

Huba Football is designed for fans who crave precision, clarity, and real-time interaction with the beautiful game. No official team or league names are required — just pure football data delivered intelligently. Download Huba Football app now.

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物

description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

My Dart Training, the training & darts scoreboard app for all darts players.
Training/Practice on a regular basis is important to improve your darts skills. But it is just as important to keep records of the trainings results. This job does My Dart Training for you.
Keep track with your progress in miscellaneous variants and bring your gameplay to the next level  by detecting your problems and optimizing your play. My Dart Training supports you in doing so.
My Dart Training is also a multiplayer darts scorer, for X01 games and many other darts games.

Currently available multiplayer games: 
* X01 Scoreboard (two input options- score or each dart,  no Player limitation)
   with the voice of Kirk Bevins
* Cricket ( no Player limitation)
* Highscore ( no Player limitation)
* Buetts Eleven
* Halve-It / Splitscore
* Killer
* Elimination
* Scoring
* RTW Scoring
* Cricket Scoring
 
Currently available training variants: 
* x01 (101, 170, 201, 301, 501, 701, 1001)
* scoring (100@)
* round the world / clock (options are singles, doubles or trebles)
* round the world scoring
* Challenge Mode (like a CPU Opponent)
* CPU Mode (15 different cpu levels or possibility to define opponent-strenght)
* Bob's 27
* Catch 40
* Highscore
* Finishing 50
* Game420
* Cricket (classic and scoring)
* Target Training
* Halve-It / Splitscore
* JDC Challenge
* A1 Drill (by George Silberzahn - Flightschool)
* Game 121
* Pristleys Triples
* Multiplayer Darts Scoreboard 
* Practice Guru 100
* Checkout Training

Functions:
* save and restore database from phone
* Profiles: use different Trainingsprofiles for different darts or setups and compare them
* caller sounds (Kirk Bevins)

More functions and  improvements are in work and will be released continuously.
(zb: more Traininggames, more Multiplayer Games, more Stats.....)

Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Privacy policy: https://fishingpoints.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://fishingpoints.app/terms

With over 10 million downloads across the Sportsmate LIVE apps you know you’re in good hands.

The League Live app by Sportsmate is the only way to stay up to date on everything Rugby League. After debuting in 2010, League Live has continued to innovate while still putting the fans first, bringing you everything that you need to be the most in-the-know footy fan possible.

Built by league fans, for league fans, League Live combines up-to-the-second live scores and stats from the NRL, State of Origin, International Fixtures and all of the major state competitions (Intrust Super Cup and Canterbury Cup) with the most in-depth statistical database, as well as exclusive analysis and the latest breaking league news and video highlights. Not to mention player ratings that are updated instantly so you can follow your fantasy team throughout the weekend.

Whether it’s an intense local derby, the colour of a State of Origin match or the drama of the final minutes of the NRL Grand Final - don’t just follow your favourite club, join them!

FOLLOW LIVE

Access live coverage of every NRL, State of Origin and International Test match plus selected state leagues including the Intrust Super Cup - QLD and Intrust Super Premiership - NSW)
Live scores for each match
Play-by-play match commentary

Player specific stat sheets

Follow the progress of your club and your favourite players throughout the NRL season. 

Follow everything to do with your club in the dedicated Team News tab

Keep an eye on your favourite players

GET THE STATS

Need a hand with your fantasy team? Been thrown a thorny league question? Need the perfect NRL trivia answer? Don’t worry we have you covered here too with a detailed database of team and individual player stats.

Up to date club and player stat rankings
Leaderboards for individual stats and KPIs 
Individual player profiles and career stats
Compare players head to head

STAY UP TO DATE

League Live by Sportsmate also brings you the breaking league news, along with exclusive match previews (and tips) as well as analysis from Sportsmate’s team of commentators from around the country.

A thorough overview of the day’s play from around the country via the Match Day tab

Watch and listen to videos and podcast series on demand

DOWNLOAD NOW

League Live by Sportsmate is available FREE for all Rugby League enthusiasts in Australia and around the world. Don’t miss a minute, download now and start tracking live footy scores today!

NEW FEATURES COMING SOON

We’re constantly releasing updates and improving our apps so we’d love to hear from you how we could make the League Live app even better. Please send all feedback to support@sportsmatemobile.com, tweet us at @Sportsmate or use the feedback form inside your app’s Settings. 

ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS

Founded in 2009 and based in Melbourne, Australia, Sportsmate Mobile is an Independent Sports Media company which creates and distributes mobile applications focused on delivering lightning fast sport scores and stats to sports fans all over the world.

With over 10 million global downloads, we are Australia's number one sports app network. Our growing suite of apps is built by a dedicated team of sports mad app developers, designers and content creators who are passionate about delivering content sports fans crave.
